name: Walk with the Living 2
description:
On a night dark and still, the witching hour beckons. A young woman gains a mysterious power to change her form. Curse or blessing, you decide. Others will make up their minds. Family secrets find light. Danger follows.



-Experience a story told from multiple perspectives.

-Enjoy expressive sprite art and character illustrations amid lush backgrounds.

-Consider space and terrain in creative ways to accomplish an array of objectives.

-Make hard choices from the perspectives of different characters throughout the story. Decide who they bond with and the direction their life takes. All choices have consequences, both positive and negative.

-Interact with an injury system where characters who fall in battle lose stats but become available in the next chapter.

-Develop characters your own way using the Learn system to boost their stats.

-Replay and make different choices to discover dozens of endings and character epilogues. Weapons, items, and gold carry over with new game plus.

-Befriend a bear!







Niamh
Oldest of her siblings, she's burdened by a family secret long-kept.


Tadhg
The middle child, he seeks a path without violence and yearns to discover himself.


Deirdre
Youngest of her siblings, her life changes in a single night.
